Description:
Remove the Zone.Identifier alternate data stream which identifies the file as downloaded from the internet.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Unblock-File
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%unblock-file %' and scriptblocktext like '%-path %')
